export const Table = ({ data }) => {
  <table>
    <tr>
      <th>Rule</th>
      <th>Error</th>
      <th>Warning</th>
    </tr>
    {Object.entries(data).map(([rule, error]) => (
      <tr>
        <td>{rule}</td>
        <td>{error === "error" ? "✅" : "-"}</td>
        <td>{error === "warn" ? "✅" : "-"}</td>
      </tr>
    ))}
  </table>;
};
const fileContents = require(options.path);

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (RENDERDOCS:path=./recommended.js) -->
<Table data={fileContents} />
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END *-->
